item.title: Threathunting I: Network setup
item.description: Introduction Why I Built a Home Lab for Threat Hunting ðŸ•µ Network Setup Basic Topology, Hardware and Tools ðŸ› Firewall configurationðŸ§± Switch configuration What I Learned Whats next Introduction This is a small series I wanted to start, where I write about my small threathunting setup and describe a little what I build and what I am doing with it.
